headline: Cardinal Health (CAH) Expands At-Home Solutions Network With New Distribution Centers
summary: Cardinal Health (CAH) recently opened a new distribution center in Fort Worth, Texas, to bolster its at-Home Solutions business, enhancing its distribution capabilities by utilizing advanced automation technology. This expansion aligns with the market's overall growth signals as observed with positive labor market data and the anticipation of potential Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Despite a relatively flat 0.88% price movement, these developments could have potentially complemented...

headline: Cardinal Health at-Home Solutions opens Texas distribution center; announces plans for new California site
summary: Cardinal Health (NYSE: CAH) announced the opening of its newest distribution center in Fort Worth, Texas – a facility solely dedicated to the at-Home Solutions business, a leading medical supplies provider that serves more than 6 million people annually in the United States. In addition, Cardinal Health announced that it will also break ground on a new distribution center dedicated to at-Home Solutions in Sacramento, California, this fiscal year.
